tool_description: Validates alternative text against WCAG accessibility guidelines and provides detailed compliance reporting with improvement suggestions.

alt_text.description: Alternative text to check for WCAG compliance

wcag_level.description: WCAG compliance level: A, AA, AAA

content_purpose.description: Content purpose: decorative, informative, functional, complex

check_categories.description: Specific categories to check: perceivable, operable, understandable, robust

error_messages: Invalid alt text: Provide valid alternative text to check.
Invalid WCAG level: Use one of [A, AA, AAA].
Invalid content purpose: Use one of [decorative, informative, functional, complex].
Invalid check categories: Use categories from [perceivable, operable, understandable, robust].
Compliance check failed: Unable to complete WCAG validation process.
usage: Provide alt_text and content_purpose, optionally specify wcag_level and check_categories. The tool returns detailed compliance status and improvement recommendations.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, needs_review

guideline_results.description: Results for each applicable WCAG guideline

violations.description: List of specific compliance violations found
